ai-tika-abh06t72:2_0: having rubbed the top of the three worlds, were to worship (them).
ai-tika-abh06t72:3_0: “By the state of existence, the Earth, and the virtues of the Dhamma,
ai-tika-abh06t72:5_0: Relying on the teaching of the noble ones,
ai-tika-abh06t72:6_0: I will speak the truths of the truth that are prepared,
